Name: Metal Punch
About the game: I wanted to make a game, so I did it. This game is a 2D horizontal board action game In the mainline mode, you can fight and win with different bosses to experience different cheery battles, You can choose the most simple means of attack to defeat the powerful enemy, or you can choose different skills in the game to win a magnificent victory, At the same time, you can also choose the furious mode of endless challenges. In this mode, you can constantly defeat the enemy to obtain the terms to strengthen yourself, which contains more new skills waiting for you to discover. Beating the boss in the main level will also unlock the story fragments of each boss. Collect the information fragments to explore the truth behind it. In short, thank you for playing my game. I hope you can find happiness in it.
